Translations.Text: Ih, Nefya yak l$elb iberrzen
iwakken ad Isemmeê Öebbi ibekkaven ik id izwaren akked wid igwran. Ad ak Itim l$it iS, a k Iawi d ubrid uwqim
A k Iall Öebbi tallalt tuzmirt
D Neppa id Issersen talwit deg ulawen n lmumnin, iwakken ad yim$uô liman nnsen. N Öebbi Iâsekôiwen n tmurt akked igenwan. Öebbi Izga Iééeô, d Bab n ûûwab
Iwakken ad Issekcem wid akked tid iumnen, ar leonanat, ddawat sen isaffen ppazzalen, degsen ad wekkôen. Ad asen Issemsu tucmitin nnsen. D wagi, ar Öebbi, ay d rrbeê abarar
Ad Iâaqeb ixabiten, tixabitin, imcurak, timcurak, wid id ipfekkiôen Öebbi yir afekkeô. Izzi yasen ddens. Irfa Öebbi fellasen, Ixza ten. Ihegga yasen d Loahennama. A tu$alin tucmip
N Öebbi iâsekôiwen n tmurt akked igenwan. Öebbi Izga d Uzmir, d Bab n ûûwab
Ih, Nuzen ik id d anagi, d abcir, d aneddaô
iwakken a ppamnem s Öebbi akked Umazan iS, a T kfum, ad aS tanzem, a T tesbuccuâem taûebêit, tameddit
Wid iâaqden yidek âaqden kan d Öebbi. Afus n Öebbi nnig ufus nnsen. Win iêenten, d imanis kan i isseênet. Win iîîfen deg wayen i$ef iâuhed Öebbi, ad as Ifk arraz abarar

Ad ak inin wid igwran, seg uâôaben n ucluê: "i $ ice$wlen, d ayla nne$ akked twaculin nne$. Ssuter a neppusemmeê". Qqaôen s yilsawen nnsen, ayen ur nelli deg ulawen nnsen. Ini: "anwa ara kwen iselken si Öebbi, s wacemma, ma Ib$a yawen vveôô, ne$ ma Ib$a yawen aba$uô? Xaîi, Izga Öebbi Ippuxebbeô af wayen txeddmem
Xaîi, t$ilem Amazan akked lmumnin ur d ppu$alen ara, d awez$i, ar twaculin nnsen. Ayagi, issefôeê ulawen nnwen. Nnwaya nnwen dir ip. Kunwi d agdud imsenger
Wid ur numin s Öebbi, akked Umazan iS, ihi, aql a£ Nhegga d ajajiê i ijehliyen
N Öebbi, tagelda n tmurt akked igenwan. Ipsemmiê i win i S ihwan, Ipâuqub win i S ihwan. Öebbi Izga Ipsemmiê, Ipêunu

A d inin wid igwran: "ma tôuêem a d t$eltem, ooet a$ a neddu yidwen". B$an ad bedlen awalen n Öebbi. Ini: "ur teppeddum yidne$, d awez$i. Akka ay d izwar wawal n Öebbi". A d inin: "teêsedm a$"! Xaîi, cwiî kan ay fehhmen

Ini i wid igwran, seg uâôaben n ucluê: "a ppepwanecdem s agdud amaâwaôu, uqsiê; a t tenna$em, ne$ ad anzen. Ma tu$em awal, ad awen Ifk Öebbi arraz igerzen. Ma twexxôem, akken twexxôem uqbel, a kwen Iâaqeb s lqeôê
Ur telli tiyta deg uder$al, ne$ deg urejdal, ne$ deg umuvin. Win iunzen i Öebbi akked Umazan iS, a t Issekcem di leonanat, ddawat sen isaffen ppazzalen. Win iwexxôen, a t Iâaqeb s lqeôê
Ni$ Iôuva Öebbi lmumnin, mi âaqden yidek, seddaw ttejôa. Iéôa i illan deg ulawen nnsen, Issers d fellasen talwit, I$na ten s l$elb aqôib
akked waîas n lerbaê, ara îîfen. Öebbi Izga d Uzmir, d Bab n ûûwab
Iwaââed awen Öebbi a d teîîfem lerbaê aîas. I$awel awen d deg waya. Ikkes fellawen afus n medden. Akken ad yili ussekni i lmumnin, a kwen iawi d ubrid uwqim
Tayev, iwumi ur tezmirem, ihi, Izzi as Öebbi. Öebbi Izga Izmer i yal cci
Lemmer i kwen nnu$en wid ijehlen, ad rewlen, sinna, ur ppafen bab, ne$ asettaô
D tannumi n Öebbi i illan si zik. Ur teppafev abeddel, d awez$i, di tannumi n Öebbi
D Neppa i Ikksen afus nnsen segwen, akked ufus nnwen segsen, di te$zut n Mekka, siwev Iss$elb ikwen fellasen. Öebbi Izga Ipwali ayen txeddmem

D nitni i ijehlen. Swexxôen kwen si Loamaâ n Lêaôam, ugin ad iawev usfel s amkan is. Lemmer maççi d lmumnin, argaz tameîîut, ur ten tessinem, a ten têazem ur teéôim; segsen a d tegwrim di le$ôuô - ni$ Öebbi Issekcam s aêunu S, win i S ihwan - lemmer mfaôaqen, yili, war ccekk, Nesâadda, $ef wid segsen ijehlen, aâaqeb aqeôêan
Mi rran wid ijehlen, aêernun deg ulawen nnsen, aêernun n war tussna, Issers ed Öebbi talwit iS af Umazan iS, akked lmumnin. Iqqen asen awal uêezzeb. Iwata ten, klalen t. Öebbi Izga Iéôa yal cci

Ni$ Issawev Öebbi, i Umazan iS, tamu$li s tidep: war ccekk, a pkecmem Loamaâ n Lêaôam, ma Irad Öebbi, di laman, iqweôôa nnwen ûûeîlen u qeôcen, ur teppagwadem. Iéôa ayen ur teéôim. Ihegga yawen d, ugwar aya, l$elb aqôib
Neppa id Iuznen Amazan iS s nnhaya, akked ddin n tidep, iwakken a t Issifrer $ef ddin meôôa. Iqadd Öebbi d Anagi

Muêemmed d Amazan n Öebbi. Wid illan yides, qesêen ar ijehliyen, êninit garasen. A ten twaliv îîinizen, kennun, ssuturen lfevl s$uô Öebbi akked llza. Ccama nnsen, deg udmawen nnsen, d lateô n lekni. Ata wayen i ten icban di Tuôa akked wayen i ten icban di Linoil: am uâaqqa, iger ed im$i s, isoehd it. Ad iuzur, ad iâaooeô $ef yile$ is. Ippaâoab ifellaêen; i$webben yissen ijehliyen. Iwaââed Öebbi ssmaê akked warraz abarar, i wid degsen iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan
